name: No Dice (SuperTortoiseTeam)
description:
It's night, you're all dressed up - Somebody told you there was an event that would be of interest to you, an important friend of yours.

The simple invitation reads "Get all gussied up, come to the casino. Noir appropriate please" - Sinclair

You never liked parties.  Especially not these types. But you'll go anyway. Maybe you can roll some games. Maybe cause some havoc.

-------------------------------------
A physics puzzle game

Sorry! It's unfinished! We had planned out ~ 10 scenarios with additional characters

We ended up with 4 of Danny's scenarios thrown together (barely) and they need polish/balancing ... some more time spent on object settings. Maybe we'll spend time to update it down the road.
